p: Vy-Per [ 160] is another bioinformatic instrument that utilizes reference human genome for filtering out reads of a host’s DNA. Sequences that are not dismissed during this step are compared with the data in the NCBI database using BLAT tool [ 163]. Although experiments set up to test Vy-Per use samples with a rather high coverage (80× for samples and 40× for controls), it is not mandatory, but lowers the risk of false positives.
